author: Sébastien Puyet
comment: Ne fonctionne pas, borne velib pleine et l'application dit qu'il reste 7 places, ça arrive très souvent même en rafraîchissant
No longer works with new velib (2018). This is disappointing because it was a great app.

author: Evgeniy Markin
comment: Super user friendly and reliable app. Must have in Paris.

author: Adrien Fallou
comment: Appli simple, utilisable même sur une connexion lente.

author: Paul Prescott
comment: Great app to find a Velib'.

reply.author: Michel Gauzins
reply.content:
Il semble que ce soit un bug avec la dernière mise à jour des Play Services : http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39668549/why-has-the-read-phone-state-permission-been-added
La dernière version de l'application résout le problème.

title: Nice app

author: Richard Ings
comment: Downloaded this rather than the official app because of poor reviews, so can't compare, but this has great functionality, really clear and simple to use, so highly recommend.
title: Works like a charm

author: Stephen Bastians
comment: Very reliable and useful app. Using the bike system without it would have been much harder.
title: Worked perfectly for my trip to Paris

author: Paul Anton
comment: Makes for a much smoother use than what the official velib has to offer. I found the map smartly developed, with proper clustering and clear visual markers. Also, the last refresh' time indicator is of great help. Sent it to background and was later (offline) still able to visualize the map and markers (outdated, but still useful). In that sense, some limited offline functionality would be a great add-on (even the stations' locations only with no indication of available bikes). Keep up the good work!
title: Life saver

author: Miguel Duarte
comment: I've just spent a few days in Paris and this app was really useful! It kept all the map data that was loaded while I was in a WiFi spot, which was cool since I didn't have a data package. I just wish that my location was shown on the map when I was not connected to the Internet. Thanks for the great work! ;)
title: Great design and functionality

author: Wildfire van willigenburg
comment: I really like the app.  It retains the last downloaded data including the map,  which is absolutely great when you really must return your bike.
title: Very good

author: Gábor Ruppert
comment: Offline map support, manual refresh lifesaver if you have no data roaming.
title: It's a must if you're in Paris

author: Rémy El Sibaïe Besognet
comment: Fait ce qu'on lui demande correctement contrairement à l'officielle.
title: Fonctionne tout simplement

author: Giorgio Cesari
comment: I prefer this one rather than the official one! Five stars if "Mon compte" were available
title: Awesome

author: Olivier Lucas
comment: Application top 🔝
title: Bien mieux que l'application officielle

author: Marc I.
comment: Bien mieux que l' app officielle. Merci  Michel.
title: Fonctionnel et rapide

author: Louis Garczynski
comment: Marche parfaitement, super app.

author: Huy Tran
comment: fast n useful. battery friendly
title: great apps

author: Hugh Dell
comment: Better than the official app.
title: All we need

author: Anand Francis
comment: Pretty good and live

author: Benjamin Cassinat
comment: Cette appli est la meilleure du marché. Plus précise et utilisable que l'application officielle.
title: Meilleure que l'officielle

author: Anis.M
comment: Plus rapide que l'application officielle et la gestion des favoris est amelioree
title: Beaucoup mieux que l'application officielle

author: Dave Wiltzius
comment: Map with GPS location is great for general navigation and finding bike stall locations. Indicator of bike availability very helpful, but I only verified at the two locations used.

author: Michel THAI
comment: Very useful
